bjt_sutta: 17. hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgatasuttaṃ
13. bāhira dukkhachanda, bāhira dukkharāga, bāhiradukkha chandarāgasuttāni
22. atīta dukkha, anāgata dukkha, paccuppanna dukkhasuttāni
31. bāhirātīta dukkha, bāhirānāgata dukkha, bāhira paccuppannadukkhasuttāni
40. atīta yaṃ dukkha, anāgata yaṃ dukkha, paccuppanna yaṃ dukkhasuttāni
43. atīta yadanatta, anāgata yadanatta, paccuppanna yadanattasuttāni
46. bāhirātīta yadanicca, bāhirānāgata yadanicca, bāhira paccuppanna yadaniccasuttāni
